mapper.insert: insert into member (userID, password1, password2, userName, email, phone, addr1, addr2, gender, birth ) values (#{userID},#{password1},#{password2}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{addr1}, #{addr2},#{gender},#{birth})
mapper.select: select * from member where userID = #{userID} and phone = #{phone}
mapper.update: update member set password1 = #{password2}, userName = #{userName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where userID = #{userID}
mapper.select: select * from member where userName = #{userName} and phone = #{phone}
select userID, userName from member where userID=#{userID} and password1=#{password1}
